title: Ganged Up
description: GAY BDSM EROTICA. In this third book, 25-year-old Lucas Devero has already submitted to leather man Jake Heller. Now, Jake is ready to push Lucas's boundaries and find out just how far--and how rough--the techie hottie is willing to go in order to satisfy Jake. By the end, Lucas begins to understand what it means to be Jake Heller's boy.
author: S.F. Tanner
